Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Hey there! Are you updated on the latest news? People are talking about the much-awaited Federal Budget in Australia. People learned that there might not be a real wage increase until early next year but hang in there by 2024 wages are predicted to exceed inflation rates! There is also good news for Sydney Harbour as the Federal Government is allocating an additional $45 million in the budget to fix vital repairs to the heritage sites. Stay tuned as we await the full details of the budget announcement!
